configuration.name: widget_08066274294293883
configuration.stem: How do the tree’s leaves work with other organs and organ systems to meet the basic needs of the tree?
configuration.feedbackText: The tree’s roots (organ) in the root system (organ system) draw nutrients from the soil, and its xylem (tissue) transports the nutrients to the leaves, which perform photosynthesis. The tree’s phloem (tissue) moves the food to the rest of the tree.
